scenario.sendMessageSIP: UPDATE sip:[inviteeName1]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR] SIP/2.0 To: "[inviteeName1]" <sip:[inviteeName1]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR]> From: "[clientName]"<sip:[clientName]@[107_DOMAIN_ADDR]>;tag=[localTag] Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [Adresse-Tester];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId];id=[clientName] Call-ID: [newCallId] CSeq: [newCseqNumber] UPDATE Max-Forwards: 70 Proxy-Authorization: IMS_GPRS_SCHEMA token="999" Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, REFER, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, PUBLISH Contact: <sip:[clientName]@[Adresse-Tester]>;+g.poc.talkburst Supported: timer User-Agent: PoC-client/OMA1.0 XmlLoader/v0.0 Session-Expires: 3600;refresher=uac Accept-Contact: +g.poc.talkburst;require;explicit Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Route: <sip:ptt@[Adresse-Server];lr;mode=originating> Route: <sip:ptt@[Adresse-Tester];lr;mode=originating> Content-Length: 0
